quote: Nothing that results in human progress is achieved with unanimous consent. – Christopher Columbus
fact: Odds of being killed by lightening? 1 in 2million/killed in a car crash? 1 in 5,000/killed by falling out of bed? 1 in 2million/killed in a plane crash? 1 in 25 million.
joke: How many hipsters does it take to change a lightbulb? Oh, it's a really obscure number. You've probably never heard of it.
